verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> we ought <S%G1163><s%> to give the more <S%G4056><s%> earnest <S%G4056><s%> heed <S%G4337><s%> to the things which we have heard, <S%G191><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> at <S%G3379><s%> any <S%G3379><s%> time <S%G4218><s%> we should let them slip. <S%G3901><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> by angels <S%G32><s%> was steadfast, <S%G949><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> transgression <S%G3847><s%> and disobedience <S%G3876><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> a just <S%G1738><s%> recompense <S%G3405><s%> of reward; <S%G3405><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> shall we escape, <S%G1628><s%> if we neglect <S%G272><s%> so <S%G5082><s%> great <S%G5082><s%> salvation; <S%G4991><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> at the first <S%G746><s%> began <S%G746><s%> <S%G2983><s%> to be spoken <S%G2980><s%> by the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and was confirmed <S%G950><s%> to us by them that heard <S%G191><s%> him;

God <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G4901><s%> bearing <S%G4901><s%> them witness, <S%G4901><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> with signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders, <S%G5059><s%> and with divers <S%G4164><s%> miracles, <S%G1411><s%> and gifts <S%G3311><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his own will? <S%G2308><s%>
For to the angels <S%G32><s%> has he not put <S%G5293><s%> in subjection <S%G5293><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> to come, <S%G3195><s%> whereof <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we speak. <S%G2980><s%>

But one <S%G5100><s%> in a certain <S%G4225><s%> place testified, <S%G1263><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> is man, <S%G444><s%> that you are mindful <S%G3403><s%> of him? or <S%G2228><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>that you visit <S%G1980><s%> him?

You made <S%G1642><s%> him a little <S%G1024><s%> lower <S%G1642><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the angels; <S%G32><s%> you crowned <S%G4737><s%> him with glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor, <S%G5092><s%> and did set <S%G2525><s%> him over <S%G1909><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of your hands: <S%G5495><s%>

You have put <S%G5293><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things in subjection <S%G5293><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> his feet. <S%G4228><s%> For in that he put <S%G5293><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> in subjection <S%G5293><s%> under him, he left <S%G863><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> that is not put <S%G506><s%> under <S%G506><s%> him. But now <S%G3568><s%> we see <S%G3708><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things put <S%G5293><s%> under <S%G5293><s%> him.

But we see <S%G991><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was made <S%G1642><s%> a little <S%G1024><s%> lower <S%G1642><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> for the suffering <S%G3804><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> crowned <S%G4737><s%> with glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor; <S%G5092><s%> that he by the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should taste <S%G1089><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> for every <S%G3956><s%> man.

For it became <S%G4241><s%> him, for whom <S%G3739><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> things, and by whom <S%G3739><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> things, in bringing <S%G71><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> to glory, <S%G1391><s%> to make <S%G5055><s%> the captain <S%G747><s%> of their salvation <S%G4991><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> sufferings. <S%G3804><s%>

For both <S%G5037><s%> he that sanctifies <S%G37><s%> and they who are sanctified <S%G37><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> of one: <S%G1520><s%> for which <S%G3739><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> he is not ashamed <S%G1870><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> them brothers, <S%G80><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I will declare <S%G518><s%> your name <S%G3686><s%> to my brothers, <S%G80><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> will I sing <S%G5214><s%> praise <S%G5214><s%> to you.

And again, <S%G3825><s%> I will put <S%G3982><s%> my trust <S%G3982><s%> in him. And again, <S%G3825><s%> Behold <S%G2400><s%> I and the children <S%G3813><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> me.

For as much <S%G1893><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as the children <S%G3813><s%> are partakers <S%G2841><s%> of flesh <S%G4561><s%> and blood, <S%G129><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> likewise <S%G3898><s%> took <S%G3348><s%> part <S%G3348><s%> of the same; <S%G846><s%> that through <S%G1223><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he might destroy <S%G2673><s%> him that had <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G2904><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> that is, the devil; <S%G1228><s%>
And deliver <S%G525><s%> them who <S%G3745><s%> through fear <S%G5401><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> were all <S%G3956><s%> their lifetime <S%G2198><s%> subject <S%G1777><s%> to bondage. <S%G1397><s%>
For truly <S%G1222><s%> he took <S%G1949><s%> not on <S%G1949><s%> him the nature of angels; <S%G32><s%> but he took <S%G1949><s%> on <S%G1949><s%> him the seed <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

Why <S%G3606><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things it behooved <S%G3784><s%> him to be made <S%G3666><s%> like <S%G3666><s%> to his brothers, <S%G80><s%> that he might be a merciful <S%G1655><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> in things pertaining to God, <S%G2316><s%> to make <S%G2433><s%> reconciliation <S%G2433><s%> for the sins <S%G266><s%> of the people. <S%G2992><s%>
For in that he himself <S%G846><s%> has suffered <S%G3958><s%> being tempted, <S%G3985><s%> he is able <S%G1410><s%> to succor <S%G997><s%> them that are tempted. <S%G3985><s%>
